snippet.title: Antipaint (Vilius Prakapas) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
An action-packed roquelite shooter where you battle famous works of art and each level you beat becomes a masterpiece to add to your colorful collection.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1418390/Antipaint/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------
Love indie games? Subscribe and hit the bell!
https://youtube.com/sixoneindie

Help us support the indie scene:
https://Patreon.com/SixOneIndie

Follow us on Twitter:
Six One Indie - https://www.twitter.com/SixOneIndie​

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
